casebody.data:
No. 9164. Owen v. Cotten. Error to El Paso District Court, Hon. W. S. Morris, /udge. Department One. Reversed.

On the authority of Love v. Cotten, No. 9165.

W. B. Lombard and W. N. Ruby, for plaintiffs in error. Orr, Robinett & Mason and J. C. Young, for defendants in error.

Opinion by

Mr. Justice Teller.

The controversy in this cause is identical, except as to the party plaintiffs, with that in No. 9165, Love v. Cotten et al., recently decided, and the evidence is substantially the same.

The plaintiff’s evidence was sufficient to put the defendants upon their defense, and the granting of a non-suit was error.

The judgment is reversed.

Chief Justice Hill and Mr. Justice Whité concur.
